trans-unit.source: Provides a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un insieme di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection> class is a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> objects, typically used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object to manage a set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> objects for a connection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection> classe è una raccolta di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> oggetti, in genere utilizzati per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> oggetto per gestire un set di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> oggetti per una connessione.

trans-unit.source: The transformers related to a Web Parts connection can be retrieved through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Transformers%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quelli correlati a una connessione Web part possono essere recuperati tramite il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.Transformers%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> to be added to the end of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> da aggiungere alla fine della classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds an object to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un oggetto alla fine della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The index at which <paramref name="transformer" /> has been added.
trans-unit.target: Indice in corrispondenza del quale è stato aggiunto <paramref name="transformer" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> that is checked to determine whether it is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> che viene verificato per determinare se è incluso nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether a particular transformer exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se uno specifico trasformatore è presente nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether a particular transformer is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Valore booleano che indica se uno specifico trasformatore è presente nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection.Contains%2A> method enables you to check a particular <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> object and determine whether it is part of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection.Contains%2A> metodo consente di controllare un determinato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> dell'oggetto e determinare se fa parte di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> objects to contain the copied collection.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> in cui è contenuto l'insieme copiato.

trans-unit.source: The starting point in the array at which to place the collection contents.
trans-unit.target: Punto di partenza nella matrice in corrispondenza del quale inserire il contenuto dell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection to an array of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Copia l'insieme in una matrice di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection.CopyTo%2A> method is useful when you want to assemble a custom array that can contain all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection> collection, a subset of those objects, or a superset of those objects.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection.CopyTo%2A> metodo è utile quando si desidera comporre una matrice personalizzata che può contenere tutti i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer> gli oggetti il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection> insieme, un subset di tali oggetti o un superset di tali oggetti.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> that is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> che corrisponde a un membro dell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of a particular member in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la posizione di un membro specifico dell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the position of a particular object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Integer che indica la posizione di un oggetto specifico nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which a value should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero in corrispondenza del quale deve essere inserito un valore.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> to insert.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> da inserire.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a transformer into the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection" /> collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce un trasformatore nell'insieme <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformerCollection" />, in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se la raccolta è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the collection and its items cannot be changed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'insieme e i relativi elementi non possono essere modificati; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The index of a particular <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> in a collection.
trans-unit.target: Indice di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> specifico in un insieme.

trans-unit.source: Returns a member of the collection based on its position in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un membro dell'insieme in base alla relativa posizione nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> located at <paramref name="index" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> che si trova in <paramref name="index" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartTransformer" /> da rimuovere dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of a specific transformer.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove la prima occorrenza di un trasformatore specifico.
